Research Tools

Open-source tools developed by Observable Compute Foundation to support research, compliance, and terminology tracking.

IRB GPT

Institutional Review Board Assistant

AI-powered tool for navigating human subjects research compliance. Helps researchers understand IRB requirements, draft protocols, and identify regulatory considerations.

Launch IRB GPT → View Source

Lexicon Explorer

Coming Q2 2026

Visual exploration of conceptual clustering patterns. Interactive network graphs showing how AI terminology relates across domains.

Definition Diff

Coming Q3 2026

Compare how the same term is defined across different sources, domains, and time periods. Track semantic drift in real-time.

For Developers

All OCF tools are open source. Contribute to existing projects or build integrations with our API.

Observable Compute Foundation

A 501(c)(3) nonprofit research institute mapping technology terminology evolution and legal-technical alignment.
